name: Super Mega Dumb Wonderland
description:
Arrows to move. 

Space to jump

L to pick up stuff

K to eat it

P to pause

A game made for the My Famicase game jam based off a fictional cartridge by  Good Boy Graphics.  Never finished but is a pet project I continually go back and get confused by.  Am converting my windows target project to a cleaner build with an html target at the moment.   I have worked a little on the project since first starting it and am submitting the demo this year.  

Link to My Famicase 2018 entry this game is inspired by:

http://famicase.com/18/softs/029.html

The mechanics I was going for were SMW2 but redone as an arcade style game like the original Mario Bros or Donkey Kong.  There is a boss room planned for after the coins are collected.  I guess I should explain the point of the game because it is a little convoluted.  Get all the coins to trade for a key to go to the boss room.  Defeat the boss in the time limit and ?

Win or a points loop where it gets harder every time.   I'm not sure and this is a really bare bones project so far.

The .exe has more of a game on it.  What I have on this page is just what I was able to get to run on html.  The next thing will be more animations and more fluid animations.
